sim.long-description: The Cessna 182 Skylane is a four-seat, single-engine, high-wing fixed-wing aircraft. First flown in 1956 and still in production, it is the second most popular Cessna model, after the 172. The model represents the "S" Variant, built between 1996 and 2001.

author.name: Heiko Schulz
author.description: 3D model, fdm, programming, textures, bug tracking, testing

author.name: Benedikt Hallinger
author.description: fuel/oil system, custom registration livery, checklists, save-state, failures, cockpit/avionics improvements and many more great additions

key.name: SPACE
key.desc: PTT - Push To Talk (via FGCom) but select radio
